page.title: 14BIRDS
page.content: PLOUGHLANDS POND-Winter gathering place for Moorhens,Breeding area for Mute Swans. {Wooden Loch-}regularly has Mallard Tufted Duck,Coot,Pochard and sometimes Goldeneye,Goosander,Mute & Whooper Swans. {River Teviot-}has Goosander Mute and Whooper Swans,Goldeneye and Wigeon. Winter feeding area Whooper Swans 100- 120 and Greylag geese 700-1200 birds {Breeding in Area-}Barn Owls, Sparrow Hawk, Hen Harrier and Goshawk. {Surrounding Water-}Sledge Warblers, Reed Buntings,Dunnocks,TreeSparrows,Pipits Heron,Kestrel,Lap-Wing,Owls,Oyster Catchers and Kingfisher. {Fields-}Phesant,Red-poll,Blackbirds, Robins,Tits,Sparrows,Yellowhammers, Starlings,Wagtails,Thrushes,Chaffinch, Occasionally Wrens,Collared Doves.
